item.title: EXC
item.description: score:36 Chances: Exelon Corporation (EXC) reported an increase in revenue of 14% from FY 2022, indicating strong growth in its core business operations. The company’s increased transmission spending and investments in infrastructure indicate a commitment to shoring up grid reliability and meeting growing electricity demand, particularly from data center demand growth.
